## BaseDatamodel.beforeUpdate() method

Execute steps before the document has been updated. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) and should not be executed by it's own. The 'updateAt' attribute of the document will be changed by default. Similar to mongoose pre-update-hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @virtual */
beforeUpdate(payload: iBaseDatamodel): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | [iBaseDatamodel](./clm-core.ibasedatamodel.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
